summary: Build a premium, modern, luxury (black & gold) business website for "Gold Laser Cutting" in Etawah, Uttar Pradesh, targeting local jewellery shop owners and retail customers, with mobile-friendly fast design, lead/contact CTAs, and local SEO.
architectural_notes: Business contact CTAs must link to phone (tel:) and WhatsApp number, and be prominent/sticky as specified.
Include Google Maps embed/integration for Etawah, Uttar Pradesh in the contact section.
Prioritize performance: mobile-first, fast loading design while using smooth animations/scroll effects.
On-page local SEO targeting specified keywords for Etawah/UP queries.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Luxury minimalist logo mark for "Gold Laser Cutting" in black and gold (gold-laser-cutting-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Wide luxury hero background with subtle black texture and gold accents, no text (hero-bg-luxury.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Jewellery laser cutting sample placeholder image 1, macro-style gold jewelry detail, no text (gallery-sample-01.dim_1200x900.png)
- Jewellery laser cutting sample placeholder image 2, macro-style gold jewelry detail, no text (gallery-sample-02.dim_1200x900.png)
- Jewellery laser cutting sample placeholder image 3, macro-style gold jewelry detail, no text (gallery-sample-03.dim_1200x900.png)
- Jewellery laser cutting sample placeholder image 4, macro-style gold jewelry detail, no text (gallery-sample-04.dim_1200x900.png)
- Jewellery laser cutting sample placeholder image 5, macro-style gold jewelry detail, no text (gallery-sample-05.dim_1200x900.png)
- Jewellery laser cutting sample placeholder image 6, macro-style gold jewelry detail, no text (gallery-sample-06.dim_1200x900.png)

existing_features.title: Create a single-page, premium luxury marketing website for the business "Gold Laser Cutting" (Etawah, Uttar Pradesh, India) with a consistent black-and-gold theme, elegant typography, and a mobile-first responsive layout.

Implement the homepage hero section with the exact heading and subheading provided and three primary CTAs: Call Now (tel:7906968141), WhatsApp Now (link to WhatsApp chat for 8126108743), and Get Quote (scrolls to a quote/contact form section).
Add an About Us section in English describing 5+ years of jewellery laser cutting experience, advanced laser machines, high precision, fine finishing, and being trusted in Etawah.
Add a Services section listing all services provided by the user, displayed as premium cards or a clean list with icons, keeping copy in English.
Add a Gallery section with luxury-styled image placeholders for jewellery cutting samples, using locally stored static images in the frontend public assets.
Add a Why Choose Us section containing all six bullet points provided by the user.
Add a Testimonials section with 3 positive customer reviews (English), presented in a premium card layout.
Add an FAQ section that includes the four provided questions and clear English answers aligned with the business (time to cut, custom designs, starting price, bulk orders).

Add a Contact section including: business name, location (Etawah, Uttar Pradesh), primary phone number (7906968141), WhatsApp number (8126108743), a simple Get Quote form (name, phone, message), and a Google Maps embed for Etawah, Uttar Pradesh.

Implement a sticky WhatsApp button that remains visible while scrolling and opens WhatsApp chat to 8126108743; also ensure click-to-call is available in the header/hero and contact section via tel:7906968141.

Add on-page SEO and technical SEO for local search: set page title, meta description, Open Graph tags, canonical URL placeholder, and include the target keywords naturally in headings/sections; also add JSON-LD structured data for a local business using the provided business name and location.
Add smooth animations and modern scrolling effects across sections (e.g., fade/slide-in on scroll, subtle hover transitions) while respecting performance and accessibility (reduced motion support).
Add generated static image assets (logo + luxury placeholders) into the frontend and use them in the hero and gallery to reinforce the premium brand feel.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create luxury black & gold themed, modern, mobile-friendly, fast-loading website for Gold Laser Cutting (Etawah, UP)
Homepage hero with specified heading/subheading and CTA buttons: Call Now, WhatsApp Now, Get Quote
About Us section highlighting 5+ years experience, advanced laser machines, precision/fine finishing, trusted in Etawah
Services section listing all provided laser cutting services (custom/name/pattern/fine detail/bulk orders)
Gallery section with image placeholders for jewellery cutting samples
Why Choose Us section with listed value points (experience, advanced machine, finishing, fast delivery, trusted, affordable)
Testimonials section with 3 positive customer reviews
FAQ section answering the four specified questions (time, custom designs, starting price, bulk orders)
Contact section including location, Google Maps integration, sticky WhatsApp button, and click-to-call feature
SEO optimization for provided local keywords to rank for jewellery laser cutting searches in/near Etawah
Add smooth animations and modern scrolling effects across the site
